topic: US military escalates 'war on drugs' with lethal strikes against Venezuelan vessels in the Caribbean
evaluation: This cluster provides a highly coherent and continuous narrative detailing the Trump administration's escalating military campaign against alleged Venezuelan drug traffickers in the Caribbean. The story begins with the initial lethal strikes, progresses through subsequent attacks and military deployments, covers regional reactions and internal White House orchestration, and culminates with the administration's legal justifications. All selected articles are directly relevant, chronologically consistent, and contribute significantly to understanding the multi-faceted story. Article 'society/2025/sep/04/fentanyl-guns-us-mexico-border-arizona-california' was de-noised as it discusses fentanyl trafficking at the US-Mexico border, which is entirely separate from the Caribbean operations.
